# OncoLlama Assets

Assets for OncoLlama: Generating high fidelity synthetic cancer letters, and fine-tuning LLMs for structured data extraction.

```text
ğŸ“ ONCOLLAMA_ASSETS
â”œâ”€â”€ prompts/             # Prompt templates
â”œâ”€â”€ schema.py            # Pydantic model for specifying expected OncoLlama output structure
â”œâ”€â”€ wrapper.py           # Wrapper class for serving, and operating on, stored OncoLlama assets
```
